publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-204.1 Johann Lamont: Olympic Gamesâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-204) in the name of Murdo Fraser, leave out from ", and believes" to end and insert "and Paralympics; believes that the interests of sport in Scotland and our athletes are best served if they compete as part of the British team in the 2008 Olympic Games and Paralympic Games and at subsequent Olympic Games and Paralympic Games, and further urges the Scottish Executive to work with all the relevant sporting agencies and organisations to maximise the opportunities for young Scots to benefit from UK Sport World Class Performance programmes."
